original: Lindberg, Arnold Hilding August, apotekare, Göteborg, f. 27/8/86 i Lima, Kopparb. 1., av apot. August L. o. Ellen Emilia Segerlund. G. 15 m. Ruth Carla Svensson. Barn: Sven f. 16, sjökapt., Gbg, Margareta 18, g. m. disp. Birger Lindmark, Örebro, Olle 20, med. kand., Sthlm. — Mog:ex. i Malmö 05, farm. kand. 09, apot:ex. 13. Elev v. apot. Lejonet i Malmö 05-08, anst. där 09-11, apot. i Jörlanda, Svanen i Lund, apot. i Lidköp. 13-15, Kronan i Södertälje, apot. i Varberg 16-37 varav som förest, nio mån., priv. å apet. i Hallsberg 37, transp. t. Najaden i Gbg- 43. Led. av styr. f. Gbgs-kretsen av Sv. farmrförb. 32-37, rev. i Närkes-Västmanl. krets av Sv. apotrförb. 40.
translated: Lindberg, Arnold Hilding August, pharmacist, Gothenburg, b. 27/8/86 in Lima, Kopparberg County, son of pharmacist August L. and Ellen Emilia Segerlund. Married on the 15th with Ruth Carla Svensson. Children: Sven, b. 16, seafarer, Gothenburg; Margareta, b. 18, married to Birger Lindmark, office worker, Örebro; Olle, b. 20, medical student, Stockholm. Completed secondary education in Malmö in 1905, graduated with a pharmacy degree in 1909, and obtained a pharmacist license in 1913. Was an apprentice at Apoteket Lejonet in Malmö from 1905 to 1908, employed there from 1909 to 1911, worked at Apoteket Jörlanda, Svanen in Lund, and Apoteket Kronan in Södertälje. Worked as a pharmacist in Lidköping from 1913 to 1915, and in Varberg from 1916 to 1937 where he served as manager for nine months, then became a private pharmacist in Hallsberg in 1937. Transferred to Apoteket Najaden in Gothenburg in 1943. Was a board member for the Gothenburg district of the Swedish Pharmaceutical Association from 1932 to 1937, and a committee member for the Närke-Västmanland district of the Swedish Pharmacist Association in 1940.

education.description: Completed secondary education in Malmö in 1905, graduated with a pharmacy degree in 1909, and obtained a pharmacist license in 1913.
